alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dale, southeastern Coffee, Geneva, southwestern Houston, northwestern Jackson and northeastern Holmes Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 614 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles north of Geneva to near Graceville. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Graceville, Geneva, Dothan, Enterprise, Hartford, Taylor, Level Plains, Slocomb, Samson, Malvern, Rehobeth, Clayhatchee, Esto, Madrid, Campbellton, Coffee Springs, Noma, Black and Memphis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
